name: Helle Thorning S
text: Lib Dems' polarising behaviour mirrors no-deal extremists & illustrates why our politics is stuck in deadlock. We need compromise, not bunker mentality. They shld instead back #MPs4aDeal call for govt to table x-party Withdrawal Agreement Bill. My piece://t.co/HS9UhoM9VT

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Today we launched 'MPs for a Deal.' It's critical we find a path out of the Brexit quagmire. All of us stood on manifestos promising a deal. The Withdrawal Agreement Bill was a cross-party compromise but was never voted on. Let's use it as a basis to break deadlock. #MPs4aDeal//t.co/7ivsXMb4H9

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Today's wars put children on the frontline. Battles are fought in urban areas. Explosive weapons are used there. Schools and hospitals are attacked. And aid is used as a weapon of war. We call this a war on children @HelleThorning_S opening #StopTheWarOnChildren//t.co/wOwaJz1VS4

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Our CEO @HelleThorning_S is concerned about a whole generation of #Rohingya children who are missing out on a general education, as written by the @DhakaTribune//t.co/dLK3T7dQs6

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Great to open our new emergency room in the 24hr health centre @SCinBD run for Rohingya refugees. We are providing round the clock care for sick children in the camps. Deadly diseases like cholera and diphtheria can spread easily in the hot, cramped conditions.//t.co/ie2aX0K4cU

name: Helle Thorning S
text: In one of the child friendly spaces we are running for #Rohingya children in the world's largest refugee camp. Many have seen & experienced things that no child ever should. We are running over 80 spaces like this across the camp to give them a safe space to learn & play.//t.co/vfdMk48E9X

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Our team are delivering food, running health centres which provide life-saving care and helping children get an education. We are calling on the international community to do more to hold those responsible for these atrocities to account. The Rohingya people deserve justice.//t.co/4ISJ7L40xk

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Back in the world's largest refugee camp in Cox's Bazar, Bangladesh where over a million #Rohingya refugees live, half of them children. Many of them fled atrocities in Myanmar and arrived with nothing. They are completely dependent on aid from organisations like @save_children//t.co/GDx5AOi9Vi

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Why do children suffer most in today's wars? Because their small, fragile bodies are more impacted by explosive & chemical weapons,& the denial of access to food and aid. Suffering of children in war is now higher than any time in the last 2 decades. @HelleThorning_S #MSC2019//t.co/qqsfS1xy8f

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Why does suffering of children in war matter? How we treat children says a lot about our shared humanity.And key to other debates here. If we treat children right - with access to education & a future, theyre less likely to leave their home & have to migrate. @HelleThorning_S//t.co/p1H712iqK6

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Children are deliberately denied access to food & medicine,they are recruited as soldiers and rape is used as a weapon of war. These grave violations are committed with impunity. It shouldn't be happening in 2019. This culture of impunity must end. @HelleThorning_S #MSC19//t.co/vtOukLxTdW

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Yemen is the worst place on earth to be a child. But people there told me they felt forgotten by the rest of the world. name: Helle Thorning S
text: The suffering of children in conflict zones is manmade. We have the power to end it - that is my plea to the international community and warring parties. name: Helle Thorning S

name: Helle Thorning S
text: European solidarity has come under strain, but the global challenges to which Europe can be the answer remain... If we can improve the lives of children - in Europe &the world, we can break the cycle of poverty, & strike a blow against fear &pessimism." @HelleThorning_S #EUBudget//t.co/2E4VU4CeUe

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "I have visited @eu_echo funded projects across the world and seen for myself how decisions taken here in Brussels can transform children's lives for the better. name: Helle Thorning S
text: Europe's leaders must agree on how we can deliver a more social Europe. That means putting children first... 25M children are at risk of poverty & face exclusion. The rising tide of prosperity has not reached them. The next budget must deliver for them @HelleThorning_S #EUBudget//t.co/Xcu6xUyCQV

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Lack of hope in the future usually brings instability and violence - I would then urge politicians to deliver on the promises about Europe that is a special place to live. #EUbudget is an opportunity for next generations, says @HelleThorning_S//t.co/ENKGM18WrB

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Putting children and young people at the heart of our development policy is the right thing to do. But it is also the smart thing to do." @HelleThorning_S championing investing in children at home and abroad at #EUBudget #FutureofEurope//t.co/mC1SFefrE2

name: Helle Thorning S
text: This budget gives us the opportunity to invest for the first time in the resilience of children affected by conflict. Investing in education in emergencies & psychosocial support for children who have experienced things that no child ever should. @HelleThorning_S #EUBudget//t.co/uanAxiWT1C

name: Helle Thorning S
text: It is vital that the EU supports countries hosting the largest numbers of refugees - from Bangladesh to Uganda, and Lebanon to Turkey. No country can solve this crisis on their own. @HelleThorning_S #EUBudget #FutureofEurope//t.co/cdYxRcGFtZ

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Children need more from us in Europe" Our CEO @HelleThorning_S calls 4 an #EUBudget that : invests in children & social sectors champions SDGs targets child poverty commits to gender integrates migrant & refugee children #EU4Children @GOettingerEU @CONCORD_Europe//t.co/mG7iwZ6OAY

name: Helle Thorning S
text: #EUbudget should secure the future our children's future: Europe's values, dignity, education, democracy, rule of law @HelleThorning_S. #EUaddedvalue

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "When a girl is not educated she is not equal, and she will never be equal @GlblCtzn's @madgemukund in conversation with @HelleThorning_S @AliceAlbright @YasmineSherif1 on the barriers that prevent 130M girls from getting the education they need #SheIsEducated #SheIsEqual//t.co/Eod3k5KzY6

name: Helle Thorning S
text: From Syria to Yemen we are seeing safe spaces like hospitals and schools coming under attack. We cannot accept this outrageous new normal - we must do more to protect the 1 in 6 children living in conflict zones @AJEnglish #EndWarOnChildren #UNGA73//t.co/LfBGjizv5f

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "What are the barriers for a girl that stop her going to school? It starts with attitudes. Communities or families might think a girl shouldn't go to school, or that her brothers should take priority. So the first step is overcoming those." @HelleThorning_S #SheIsEqual//t.co/Oz2cUf1Cih

name: Helle Thorning S
text: .@madgemukund leads a discussion in girls education with @YasmineSherif1, @AliceAlbright, and @HelleThorning_S Albright: We need to look at how we can undo the systemic barriers of getting girls into schools//t.co/Qur5PmhJzK

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Then even if a girl overcomes these barriers, there are barriers on the way to school. Girls often face harassment and sexual violence on the journey to school." @HelleThorning_S #SheIsEqual//t.co/Sg6qIoONro

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Child marriage is one of the biggest barriers. We work with governments to get the right laws to ban child marriage, and we also work within communities with girls and their families to keep girls in school and stop them becoming child brides." @HelleThorning_S #SheIsEqual//t.co/6I1OyEJh05

name: Helle Thorning S
text: The suffering of 1 in 6 children growing up in conflict zones is worse today than any time in recent decades. The international community & warring parties have power to stop this. name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Warring parties must follow the rules of war: Children and civilians cannot be targeted Aid agencies must have full impeded access to deliver aid Safe spaces like schools must not be targeted. When these rules are broken there cannot be impunity." @HelleThorning_S #unga//t.co/8d8TMCyHsr

name: Helle Thorning S

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "These brutal trends in warfare mean more children facing unimaginable trauma. More children going hungry. More children falling victim to diseases. More children trapped on the frontline without aid. That is why we are calling it a War on Children" @HelleThorning_S #unga//t.co/agdibZFOYg

name: Helle Thorning S

name: Helle Thorning S
text: So sad to hear Kofi Annan has passed away. A great man who fought so hard for those who are left behind. Even in his last days he was busy speaking out against #Rohingya persecution. We will remember him for his tireless efforts to create a better, more peaceful world.

name: Helle Thorning S
text: I spoke to @bbcworldservice about what I saw in #Yemen, the worst place on earth to be a child right now, and why aid agencies like us @save_children need to be given unimpeded humanitarian access so that we can save lives.//t.co/n0Mma3QyQv

name: Helle Thorning S
text: Our new report finds girls living in poverty are 76% more likely to get married too young. Early marriage makes her more likely to leave school, become pregnant & suffer abuse. It's time to end child marriage to give every girl the childhood she deserves.//t.co/KJFI2lCTcU//t.co/YsevaDpnSz

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "World leaders have got to make much quicker progress for girls if we are going to meet the goal they have set of gender equality by 2030 #SDGs. Let's start by ending child marriage and making sure every girl goes to school." Our CEO @HelleThorning_S on @CNBCi//t.co/fe931tMxoF

name: Helle Thorning S
text: "Every seven seconds a girl under 15 is married. Then she drops out of school and becomes pregnant before she is emotionally or physically ready. We've got to stop this if we're going to see a world where girls have the same chance as boys." Our CEO @HelleThorning_S on @CNBCi//t.co/KIMP6hj7Vb

name: Helle Thorning S
